message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $10,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $9,500 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for something closer to $9,800. I'm confident this price reflects the true value of the product.
I've considered your proposal, Alice. While I respect the value of the product, I can only offer $9,600.
